Sentencas: The chemical interactions between several aluminosilicate glasses and components at the anode side of SOFC have been investigated.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Severe reactions occur if the modifier ions are Ba and Ca.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: MgO base sealants have been investigated in detail.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The formation of some detrimental phases are seen.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cordierite forms with many reaction mixtures of sealants with ZrO2 stabilized with 8 mol % Y2O3 (as electrolyte) or nickel (as anode).
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: On the other hand, with oxide dispersion strengthened Cr5Fe1Y(2)O(3) and steel, another detrimental phase, cristobalite, is favored.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: There appears to be a competitive formation of these two detrimental phases in some cases.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In some of the interactions none of the detrimental phases appears.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The diffusion behavior of the cations across the interfaces has been investigated.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Among all the cations, chromium diffuses the maximum.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The diffusion coefficient of chromium for the diffusion couples of different sealants with ODS alloy have been determined.
Titulo: Chemical interactions between aluminosilicate base sealants and the components on the anode side of solid oxide fuel cells
